document.full_text: more than half of the haitians driven into camps by the 2010 earthquake have moved out, but most of them appear to have been forced out or to have left to escape crime and living conditions.
document.title: haitians forced out of tents to homes just as precarious
lines_and_colors: more than half of the haitians driven into camps by the 2010 earthquake have moved out, but most of them appear to have been forced out or to have left to escape crime and living conditions.
